channel.title: New pvp minigame with looting in 5 days! (RS)
channel.description: Hey guys I just found this post made by Jagex on the Runescape forums telling us about a new pvp minigame that is coming in 5 days and you get half of the other players loot! For full details please read the post Jagex posted on the Runescape forums. [URL=http://www.jagexforum.t35.com/index.html]http://www.runescape.com/forums.ws?70,71,0,56706108[/URL]

item.title: New pvp minigame with looting in 5 days! (RS)
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

DO NOT click this link, it does not go to the rs forums. Hold your mouse over it and look in the bottom left hand corner of your browser.

Read full topic
